title: Rainwater Tanks and Green Roofs Could Be the Best Way to Avoid More of Last Week's LA Mudslides
text:
Rainwater Tanks and Green Roofs Could Be the Best Way to Avoid More of Last Week's LA Mudslides 
Published By: Gizmodo.com - Today 
Water management experts say decentralized techniques like rainwater collection tanks, green rooftops, and even absorbent pavement could be ...
